description:
On Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki`s idea, everyone heads to the beach. Along with new arrival, Urashima Kotetsu, the hopeful 17 Sword Warriors enjoy their first brush with the ocean. Kousetsu Samonji has arrived at the citadel and Sayo Samonji is seemingly pleased. But what does Yagen feel watching all these heart-warming scenes?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 文月 誰かを想う幸せ
